hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Hookshot# and #the Nocturne of Shadow#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern MQ Iron Boots Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Hookshot#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Switch Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Hover Boots#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Heart Container#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Twinrova#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #3# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #the Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Keaton Mask# and #Ganon's Castle Boss Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #an Ice Trap#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Epona's Song#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Time#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #the Prelude of Light#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: That's a nice wall you got there. Would be a shame if I just... clipped right through that.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Hover Boots#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Queen Gohma# holds...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Huge Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #3# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Ocarina C down Button#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Lullaby Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #the Key#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Time#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Bottom of the Well#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #Din's Fire#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: Did you know that the Discord server has a public Plandomizer library?
